Name: Walk the Path of the Dragon
Description: Jocaresa asked for your help collecting Remnant Energy crystals from the dragon bones. She claims this could grant you the power of an ancient dragon.
QuestDesc: Jocaresa asked for your help collecting Remnant Energy crystals from the dragon bones. She claims this could grant you the power of an ancient dragon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Visitor from afar, come thou to bask in the power of my Master?

Options.PlotLineKey: You have an odd way of speaking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Behold! Their wings so great, they blot out the heavens! Even eons after death, Their majestic form looms still like the lofty peaks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This power. It's precisely why I call Them my Master.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Odd? Ahem... Well, it's quite clear that this is my way of showing respect for my Master... As written within the novels, you see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait, don't look at me like that! D-Do you not feel empowered under the presence of the mighty dragon?!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I don't feel any frequency from it...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... Why won't you understand that size matters? Nobody these days appreciates the charisma of dragons!!

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I digress... Though my Master is no longer with us, Their powers live on within Their remains...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Locate and bring me the Remnant Energy from Their remains, and I will gladly share Their power with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I digress... Though my Master is no longer with us, Their powers live on within Their remains...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Locate and bring me the Remnant Energy from Their remains, and I will gladly share Their power with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Somewhere, the flames begin to burn stronger...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh... How can this be? I am unable to sense anything from the Master's flame...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Visitor from afar, what visions have you gathered from the flames you kindled?

Options.PlotLineKey: A dragon with burning wings ripping the earth apart?
A giant hurling lightning bolts to slay a dragon?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You... Do you have to be so blunt? If even a Resonator like you were unable to feel any powers...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ripping the earth apart... It sounds like a beast that brings nothing but destruction! Wait, it's just like that new TV series, isn't it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hurling lightning bolts... Wait, isn't this from that classic foreign mythology?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all these years, there's barely any frequency left...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But They have slumbered here since before the founding of Septimont! In ancient Septimont, this place was known as the trial grounds, where the noble deeds of legendary heroes were written throughout history...

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why would countless warriors of Septimont come all this way if not to inherit the dragon's powers?

Dialogues.Speaker: Jocaresa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I fail to understand...
